name: Matrix Quickdraw
description: A quick and dirty game for game a week this week! You may have noticed there was no game last week - I decided not to make a game during the mid semester break, and took time to work on other projects instead. Regardless, here is a new game! The theme was physics this week so I decided to explore an odd medium for physics (not using a physics engine for a game themed around physics! woah) and explore the emotion and tension physics can enhance. Hope you enjoy! :)
